fullplot: A young woman in Paris is about to divorce her husband when she discovers... he's dead; and all their money is gone. She meets a mysterious man, who tells her that the money was really his, and he wants it back, seemingly convinced that she's hiding the cash. Meanwhile, more people end up dead...
plot: A young woman in Paris is about to divorce her husband when she discovers... he's dead; and all their money is gone. She meets a mysterious man, who tells her that the money was really his,...
title: The Truth About Charlie

tomatoes.consensus: Newton has star quality, but this exercise in style can't hold a candle to the original.

writers: Peter Stone (based on the motion picture "Charade" screenplay by)
